name: .CDMTZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .CDMTZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A CDMTZ file is a mind-map template created by ConcepDraw MINDMAP, an application used to visualize ideas (known as mind maps). It is similar to .CDMZ mind map documents, as they store a diagram comprised of text, connecting relationship lines, images, and shapes, but users create them to replicate documents with similar content and appearance.

content: ConceptDraw MINDMAP is a mind-mapping tool for helping you organize and visualize ideas and plans, such as birthday parties, new construction, mobile app development, etc. The app is included with the ConceptDraw OFFICE suite, which also comes with ConceptDraw PROJECT and ConceptDraw DIAGRAM.

CS Odessa packages CDMTZ templates with ConceptDraw MINDMAP but also allows you to create custom CDMTZ templates. To access templates included with ConceptDraw MINDMAP, click the "Solutions" icon in the app. Additionally, to create custom CDMTZ templates, select File → Save as Template.

instructions: You can open CDMTZ files with CS Odessa ConceptDraw MINDMAP in Windows and macOS. To open a CDMTZ file, select File → Open. You can also click the "Solutions" icon in the app to select one of the templates included with ConceptDraw MINDMAP.
CS Odessa ConceptDraw MINDMAP can convert CDMTZ files to various file types, including the following formats:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
